TopicTitle: (hopefully) back from a year long burnout, just in time for KSP 1.0!

Articles.Content: After a year long burnout, and trying to play KSP again, I think I'm ready to get back to playing KSP without getting another burnout. I checked the news, and it looks like I'm literally just in time for KSP 1.0!

Welcome back! I didn't know it was possible to get burned out with KSP... (at lease till now that 1.0 will have heating effects ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
